Package ch.njol.yggdrasil

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassResolver  
    FieldHandler  
    YggdrasilSerializable
    Marks a class as serialisable by Yggdrasil.
    YggdrasilSerializable.YggdrasilExtendedSerializable
    A class that has transient fields or more generally wants to exactly define which fields to write to/read from stream should implement this interface.
    YggdrasilSerializable.YggdrasilRobustEnum
    Provides a method to resolve missing enum constants.
    YggdrasilSerializable.YggdrasilRobustSerializable
    A class that has had fields changed or removed from it should implement this interface to handle the now invalid fields that may still be read from stream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultYggdrasilInputStream  
    DefaultYggdrasilOutputStream  
    Fields  
    Fields.FieldContext
    Holds a field's name and value, and throws errors if primitives and objects are used incorrectly.
    JREFieldHandler
    Handles common JRE-related incompatible field types.
    JRESerializer  
    SimpleClassResolver  
    Yggdrasil  
    YggdrasilConstants  
    YggdrasilInputStream  
    YggdrasilOutputStream  
    YggdrasilSerializer<T>
    Utility to be able to save and load classes with Yggdrasil that the user has no control of, e.g. classes of an external API.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Tag  
    YggdrasilConstants.SerializationType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    YggdrasilException
    Thrown if the object(s) that should be saved/loaded with Yggdrasil do not comply with its requirements, or if Yggdrasil is used incorrectly.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    YggdrasilID
